body:
Dear Group,


I have been recently using OBJ2MESH as part of my workflow. I am finding it 
very useful. What I would like to know is if it is possible to adjust the UV 
shift and scale of a pattern associated with a mesh? Say if a pattern tiles 
4 times in the U and V, if I want for it to tile 1,2,3,6,8,etc. times and I 
wish to shift the patern by 1/2, is there a method for doing this?




Regards,


Marcus
